parameters.content:
## üìÇ SevDesk - Document Management - Part 2: Processing

**Purpose:** Advanced document processing with OCR, AI, and intelligent categorization

**Key Functions:**
üîç **OCR Text Extraction:** Converts images and PDFs to searchable text
ü§ñ **AI Classification:** Intelligent document categorization and metadata extraction
üìä **Data Validation:** Quality checks and business rule enforcement
üîó **SevDesk Integration:** Direct integration with accounting workflows
‚òÅÔ∏è **Smart Archiving:** Organized storage with advanced indexing

**Technology Stack:** OCR APIs, Machine Learning, SevDesk API, Cloud Storage

**üîê Security & Input Validation**

Receives and validates document data:
‚Ä¢ Webhook authentication checks
‚Ä¢ File format validation
‚Ä¢ Size and security scanning
‚Ä¢ Metadata integrity verification

**üîç OCR & Text Extraction**

Advanced optical character recognition:
‚Ä¢ Multi-language support (DE, EN, FR)
‚Ä¢ Table and form recognition
‚Ä¢ Handwriting detection
‚Ä¢ High accuracy text extraction

**ü§ñ AI Classification & Analysis**

Intelligent document processing:
‚Ä¢ Automatic categorization
‚Ä¢ Entity extraction (dates, amounts, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Business rule validation
‚Ä¢ Quality score assessment

**üìä Quality Control & Validation**

Comprehensive quality assurance:
‚Ä¢ OCR accuracy verification
‚Ä¢ Data consistency checks
‚Ä¢ Business rule compliance
‚Ä¢ Manual review flagging

**‚òÅÔ∏è Intelligent Archiving**

Smart document storage:
‚Ä¢ Organized folder structure
‚Ä¢ Rich metadata tagging
‚Ä¢ Search optimization
‚Ä¢ Compliance retention
